id.description: The unique identifier of the list

is_public.description: Indicates whether the list is public

is_dynamic.description: Indicates whether the list is dynamically generated

description.description: A brief description of the list

is_crm_visible.description: Indicates whether the list is visible in the CRM system

created_at.description: The date and time when the list was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the list was last updated
